creator: rvanoo@xs4all.nl
text:
Adds functionality that makes jboss element look for jbosscmp-jdbc.xml 
descriptor if ejbjar has cmpversion="2.0" set

creator: rvanoo@xs4all.nl
text:
Created attachment 3980
Improved patch. Depends on improved patch of Bug# 14707

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
I am going to have a look at your patch, and also at the bugreport 14707.
I will try to submit it if I do not have technical problems.
Not being an EJB or JBOSS expert, I hope I will get feedback after submission.

creator: rob@springwellfarms.ca
text:
No prob ... I added my new email to the CC list since my old one is getting 
cancelled in a few days

cheers
Rob

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
Patches submitted. Thanks for your contribution, and sorry for the long delay to 
check your changes in.
Please test the changes by downloading a nightly build or rebuilding ant from 
CVS. I am not familiar with JBoss myself.
I am closing the bug for now, will reopen it if someone shouts.
*** Bug 11708 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: rob@springwellfarms.ca
